Experienced mathematics tutor specializi: Experienced mathematics tutor specializing in secondary and higher secondary education. Offering personalized lessons for students struggling with algebra, calculus, and geometry.
Certified English language teacher with: Certified English language teacher with 5+ years of experience. Offering conversational English, grammar, and business English courses for all proficiency levels.
Software engineer teaching programming f: Software engineer teaching programming fundamentals, web development, and app creation. Specializing in Python, JavaScript, and introductory programming concepts for beginners.
Experienced science teacher offering tut: Experienced science teacher offering tutoring in physics, chemistry, and biology for students in grades 6-12. Focused on making science fun and understandable.
Professional career counselor helping st: Professional career counselor helping students and professionals make informed career decisions. Services include aptitude testing, resume building, and interview preparation.
